thread.title: Justin Tucker Nailed A 75-Yard Field Goal
thread.title_full: Justin Tucker Nailed A 75-Yard Field Goal

author: Patrick Redford
title: Justin Tucker Nailed A 75-Yard Field Goal
text:
Go to permalink 
The Pro Bowl is a meaningless spectacle that is only as valuable as the silly highlights it provides . For the first time, there will be a skills competition of sorts, which includes catching footballs dropped by a drone . That might be cool, but it probably won’t be nearly as impressive as Justin Tucker hitting a field goal from 75 yards out. 
Good work from the Ravens’ only good offensive player. Recommended Stories
